name: [GD] Unusual Child Processes of RunDLL32
description: Identifies child processes of unusual instances of RunDLL32 where the command line parameters were suspicious. Misuse of RunDLL32 could indicate malicious activity.
author: Elastic
query:
sequence with maxspan=1h
  [process where event.type in ("start", "process_started") and
     (process.name : "rundll32.exe" or process.pe.original_file_name == "RUNDLL32.EXE") and
      process.args_count == 1
  ] by process.entity_id
  [process where event.type in ("start", "process_started") and process.parent.name : "rundll32.exe"
  ] by process.parent.entity_id
